alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, southeastern Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 214 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cheraw, or 8 miles north of La Junta, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, southeastern Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
